ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the mobile phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(MobilePhone ) && NOT(ISNULL(MobilePhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)) && !REGEX(MobilePhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(MobilePhone )) && NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone )) && !REGEX(MobilePhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for mobile phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10
